Uses of Interface
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.Rule

Packages that use Rule
de.codescape.bitvunit.hamcrest Provides Hamcrest matchers for accessibility testing. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule Provides Rule infrastructure. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible forms. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.frames Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible frames. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible images. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.interactions Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible interaction patterns. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.links Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible hyperlinks. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.lists Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible lists. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible media. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.page Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible page structures. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.tables Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible tables. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible text. 
de.codescape.bitvunit.ruleset Provides RuleSet infrastructure and implementations. 
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.hamcrest
 

Methods in de.codescape.bitvunit.hamcrest with parameters of type Rule
static
<T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T>
ComplianceMatcher.compliantTo(Rule rule)
          Returns a ComplianceMatcher that checks one of the supported types (see JavaDoc at class level) against the given Rule.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule that implement Rule
 class AbstractRule
          Base class to all implementations of the Rule interface.
 

Methods in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule that return Rule
 Rule Violation.getRule()
          Returns the Rule causing this Violation.
 

Constructors in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule with parameters of type Rule
Violation(Rule rule, com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlElement htmlElement, String message)
          Construct a new Violation providing the Rule causing this Violation, a message describing this Violation in detail and the code in question.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms that implement Rule
 class AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule
          AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule ensures that every image button created through <input type="image"/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through it's alt attribute.
 class FieldsetContainsLegendRule
          FieldsetContainsLegendRule ensures that every <fieldset/> within the given HTML document contains a <legend/> tag as the first child element to describe the elements grouped by this <fieldset/>.
 class LabelContainsTextRule
          LabelContainsTextRule ensures that every <label/> within the given HTML document contains a textual representation for the given label.
 class LabelForInputFieldRule
          LabelForInputFieldRule ensures that every <input/> field of type text or password within the given HTML document is associated with a <label/> element that references the <input/> element through its for attribute.
 class LabelForSelectTagRule
          LabelForInputFieldRule ensures that every <select/> tag within the given HTML document is associated with a <label/> element that references the <select/> tag through its for attribute.
 class LabelForTextareaRule
          LabelForTextareaRule ensures that every <textarea/> within the given HTML document is associated with a <label/> element that references the <textarea/> element through its for attribute.
 class LabelWithoutFormElementRule
          LabelWithoutFormElementRule ensures that every <label/> tag within the given HTML document is referencing a valid form element.
 class UniqueLabelForFormElementRule
          UniqueLabelForFormElementRule ensures that there is never more than one <label/> with the same value in its for attribute.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.frames
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.frames that implement Rule
 class AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule
          AlternativeTextForInlineFrameRule ensures that every inline frame marked through <iframe/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative textual description inside it's body to explain the inline frame or a hyperlink to an alternative version of that inline frame.
 class TitleForFrameRule
          TitleForFrameRule ensures that every frame that is marked through the <frame/> element within the given HTML document provides a description of that frame through it's title attribute.
 class TitleForInlineFrameRule
          TitleForInlineFrameRule ensures that every inline frame that is marked through the <iframe/> element within the given HTML document provides a description of that inline frame through it's title attribute.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images that implement Rule
 class AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule
          AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule ensures that every area of an image map created by the <area/> tag within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through its alt attribute.
 class AlternativeTextForImageRule
          AlternativeTextForImageRule ensures that every image created by the <img/> tag within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through it's alt attribute.
 class AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule
          AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule ensures that every image created by the <img/> tag within the given HTML document that is part of a hyperlink created by the <a/> tag provides a non empty alternative text through it's alt attribute.
 class AvoidServerSideImageMapRule
          AvoidServerSideImageMapRule ensures that there are no server side image maps created by the <img ismap="ismap"/> tag within the given HTML document because they are inaccessible by users who cannot use a mouse because of some disability.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.interactions
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.interactions that implement Rule
 class AvoidMetaRefreshRule
          AvoidMetaRefreshRule ensures that there is no fixed refresh caused by the <meta http-equiv="refresh" content="seconds; URL=target"/> tag within the given HTML document.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.links
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.links that implement Rule
 class AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule
          AnchorsWithoutTargetAttributeRule ensures that no anchor <a/> tag within the given HTML document contains the target attribute that forces a link to open in a specific or new window.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.lists
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.lists that implement Rule
 class DefinitionListContainsItemsRule
          DefinitionListContainsItemsRule ensures that every definition list <dl/> within the given HTML document contains one or more definition terms <dt/> and definition descriptions <dd/>.
 class OrderedListContainsListItemsRule
          OrderedListContainsListItemsRule ensures that every ordered list <ol/> within the given HTML document contains one or more list items <li/>.
 class UnorderedListContainsListItemsRule
          UnorderedListContainsListItemsRule ensures that every ordered list <ul/> within the given HTML document contains one or more list items <li/>.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.media that implement Rule
 class AlternativeTextForAppletRule
          AlternativeTextForAppletRule ensures that every <applet/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative textual description to explain the <applet/> to everyone who is not able to view and display the <applet/> itself.
 class AlternativeTextForObjectRule
          AlternativeTextForObjectRule ensures that every <object/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative textual description to explain the <object/> to everyone who is not able to view and display the <object/> itself.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.page
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.page that implement Rule
 class AvoidAbstractRoleRule
          AvoidAbstractRoleRule ensures that no abstract roles that are part of the Accessible Rich Internet Applications (WAI-ARIA) 1.0 document are used within the current HTML page.
 class LanguageForHtmlTagRule
          LanguageForHtmlTagRule ensures that the given HTML document provides it's language information through the lang attribute on the <html/> tag.
 class TitleForPageRule
          TitleForPageRule ensures that the document has a non empty title defined by the <title/> tag to describe that page.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.tables
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.tables that implement Rule
 class CaptionTextForTableRule
          CaptionTextForTableRule ensures that every <table/> within the given HTML document provides a title by having a <caption>description</caption> element as the first child element inside the <table/> declaration.
 class TableHeaderContainsTextRule
          TableHeaderContainsTextRule ensures that every <th/> element within the given HTML document contains text content in it's body.
 class TableHeaderForTableColumnRule
          TableHeaderForTableColumnRule ensures that every <table/> within the given HTML document has table headers declared by <th/> for each data cell declared by the <td/> tag.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text
 

Classes in de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.text that implement Rule
 class AvoidBlinkTextRule
          AvoidBlinkTextRule ensures that every <blink/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <blink/> tag result in blinking text that cannot be stopped and it is not defined in any W3C HTML specification.
 class AvoidBoldTagRule
          AvoidBoldTagRule ensures that every <b/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <strong/> element should be used to outline important text.
 class AvoidItalicTagRule
          AvoidItalicTagRule ensures that every <i/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <em/> element should be used to outline important text.
 class AvoidMarqueeTextRule
          AvoidMarqueeTextRule ensures that every <marquee/> element within the given HTML document leads to a violation because the <marquee/> results in moving text that cannot be stopped and it is not defined in any W3C HTML specification.
 class HeadingContainsTextRule
          HeadingContainsTextRule ensures that all headings from <h1/> up to <h6/> within the given HTML document contain some text content in the body of the tag.
 class HeadingsInCorrectOrderRule
          HeadingsInCorrectOrderRule ensures that all headings from <h1/> up to <h6/> within the given HTML document are in correct oder.
 class TitleForAbbreviationTagRule
          TitleForAbbreviationTagRule ensures that every abbreviation that is marked through the <abbr/> element within the given HTML document provides a description of that abbreviation through it's title attribute.
 class TitleForAcronymTagRule
          TitleForAcronymTagRule ensures that every acronym that is marked through the <acronym/> element within the given HTML document provides a description of that acronym through it's title attribute.
 

Uses of Rule in de.codescape.bitvunit.ruleset
 

Methods in de.codescape.bitvunit.ruleset that return types with arguments of type Rule
 List<Rule> RuleSet.getRules()
          Returns a list of all rules contained in that rule set.
 List<Rule> BasicRuleSet.getRules()
           
 

Methods in de.codescape.bitvunit.ruleset with parameters of type Rule
 void BasicRuleSet.addRule(Rule rule)
          Adds the given Rule to that rule set.
 

Constructors in de.codescape.bitvunit.ruleset with parameters of type Rule
BasicRuleSet(Rule... rules)
          Create a BasicRuleSet from the optionally provided list of Rule instances.
